snippet: A legal review found no evidence to support allegations that Mr. Gillinson, its executive and artistic director, had tried to undermine the oversight of Mr. Perelman, its former chairman.
abstract: Legal review commissioned by Carnegie Hall finds no evidence supporting allegations that executive and artistic director Clive Gillinson tried to undermine oversight responsibilities of former chairman Ronald O Perelman or board of trustees; Perelman resigned due to professional differences with Gillinson.
lead_paragraph: A legal review found no evidence to support allegations that Mr. Gillinson, its executive and artistic director, had tried to undermine the oversight of Mr. Perelman, its former chairman.

headline.main: Carnegie Hall Stands Behind Clive Gillinson After Review of Ronald Perelman’s Complaints
headline.print_headline: Carnegie Hall Backs Director After Review of Former Chairman’s Concerns
